  • Constructor Details

    • MonsterTeam

      public MonsterTeam()
      Constructs a blank monster team list.

  • Method Details

    • addMonsterToTeam

      public void addMonsterToTeam(Monster monster)
      Adds a given monster to the players team, as long as the capacity isn't reached.
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster being added to the team.

    • removeMonsterFromTeam

      public void removeMonsterFromTeam(Monster monster)
      Removes a specified monster from the players monster team.
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster being removed from the team.

    • getMonsterTeamList

      public ArrayList<Monster> getMonsterTeamList()
      Returns the monster team list incase it is needed by other game objects.
      Returns:
      monsterTeam an ArrayList that contains all of the players current monsters.

    • getTotalTeamFaints

      public int getTotalTeamFaints()
      Gets the total amount of faints between all the monsters on the team. This property is used by the random event generator to change the probability of a monster leaving.
      Returns:
      totalFaints an int of the total faints between all monsters on the team.

    • weakestMonster

      public Monster weakestMonster()
      Returns the monster on the team with the lowest health. It will be the first to leave in a random event.
      Returns:
      monster the monster on the team with the lowest current health.

    • strongestMonster

      public Monster strongestMonster()

    • getEmptySlots

      public int getEmptySlots()
      Returns how many empty slots are left on the monster team.
      Returns:
      emptySlots an int of remaining slots on the monster team.

    • generateRandomMonsters

      public ArrayList<Monster> generateRandomMonsters(int currentDay, int numMonsters)
      Generates a specified amount of random monsters depending on the stage of the game.
      Parameters:
      currentDay - int the current ingame day (affects max level)
      numMonsters - int the total amount of monsters to generate.
      Returns:
      monsterList an ArrayList of the freshly generated monsters.
